channel.title: Weight Loss on deal with your weight blog
channel.description: Recent content in Weight Loss on deal with your weight blog

item.title: Nutrition Solutions Entry
item.description:
I entered the nutrition solutions 6 week challange on last Saturday. My weight was around 200lbs. I was bulking up to try to see if I could go up to 205⁄210 division in BJJ. I don’t like the way I look at that weight and decided to give nutrition solutions a try (meal prep service) to shed the weight back off in the next 6 weeks. Video:
Image: View this post on Instagram @nutritionsolutions first day of nutrition solutions challenge (Saturday).
